short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: fill forms using OpenAI predictions and saved user data.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI Form Filler is a Chrome extension designed to streamline and enhance the process of completing online forms. Utilizing the power of OpenAI's predictions and saved user data, this tool intelligently identifies and fills in various fields such as names, emails, addresses, and payment details. Whether you're signing up for a new account, making an online purchase, or filling out repetitive forms, AI Form Filler aims to save you time and effort.

Key Features:

AI-Based Predictions: Automatically identifies and fills form fields based on context using OpenAI's predictive capabilities.
Customizable User Data: Save and store personal information such as name, email, phone number, address, payment details, and more. You can modify and update this information directly from the extension's popup.
Manual Form Filling: Allows users to fill forms manually using predefined selectors, ensuring accurate placement of user data into various input fields.
Seamless Integration: Works on most websites by analyzing forms and matching them with saved data for quick and easy filling.
Secure Data Storage: Personal information is securely saved within the Chrome storage, ensuring it is easily accessible for form filling without compromising user privacy.
Adaptive Field Matching: Uses advanced AI to predict the appropriate input for each form field, even when fields are not labeled in a standard way.
How It Works:

Save Your Data: Open the extension and fill out your details in the form provided. Save information such as your name, address, credit card number, and more for future use.
One-Click Form Filling: When on a webpage with a form, click the “Fill Form” button in the extension popup to automatically fill in your details.
Automatic Predictions: If a form field is not matched to your saved data manually, the AI prediction system steps in to analyze the context and provide the best match for your saved information.
Edit Anytime: Easily update or modify your saved data from the popup to ensure the form filler stays up to date with your latest details.
AI Form Filler takes the hassle out of form filling by combining intelligent AI-based predictions with securely stored user data, enabling a fast, accurate, and user-friendly experience for all your form-filling needs.
